class.rdfs:comment:
The act of responding to a question/message asked/sent by the object. Related to AskAction

Related actions:

  • AskAction: Appears generally as an origin of a ReplyAction.
class.rdfs:label: ReplyAction

schema:resultComment.rdfs:comment: A sub property of result. The Comment created or sent as a result of this action.
schema:resultComment.rdfs:label: resultComment
